title: Novartis AG : Novartis announces positive clinical trial results for novel H7N9 vaccine
author: Emily Mullin
description: Basel, Switzerland, November 14, 2013 - Novartis announced today interim results from a Phase 1 clinical trial with its proprietary cell culture vaccine for the H7N9 avian influenza virus involving... | Basel, Switzerland, November 14, 2013 - Novartis announced today interim results from a Phase 1 clinical trial with its proprietary cell culture vaccine for the H7N9 avian influenza virus involving...
